SEARCH

Package AppointmentSystem

package AppointmentSystem
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Appointment
    Represents an appointment in the appointment management system.
    AppointmentController
    The AppointmentController class is responsible for managing appointment records, providing functionalities for administrators, doctors, and patients.
    AppointmentFlagUpdater
    The AppointmentFlagUpdater class is responsible for updating the status of appointments (e.g., PENDING, CONFIRMED, or CANCELLED) based on user input and predefined rules.
    AppointmentLoader
    The ApptLoader class is responsible for loading appointment records from a data source and populating a map of appointment records.
    AppointmentRecordViewer
    The ApptRecordViewer class provides functionalities to view appointment records.
    AppointmentSaver
    The ApptSaver class is responsible for saving appointment records to a data source.
    AppointmentService
    The AppointmentService class provides methods for managing appointment records, including loading, saving, formatting, and converting between objects and their string representations.
    DoctorLeaveSetter
    The DoctorLeaveSetter class provides functionality for managing leave for doctors.
    DoctorScheduleViewer
    The DoctorScheduleViewer class provides functionality to view a doctor's schedule.
    PatientAppointmentScheduler
    /** The PatientAppointmentScheduler class handles appointment management for patients.
    PatientAppointmentViewer
    The PatientAppointmentViewer class provides functionality for patients to view their appointments and available schedules.
    Timeslot
    The Timeslot class provides a list of predefined timeslots for scheduling appointments.
